title.value: Результаты испытания образцов гороха морфотипа 'хамелеон' в полевых условиях Беларуси
Results of field trials of pea morphotype 'chameleon' samples in Belarus

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Pashkevich, P.A., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for  Arable Farming

abstract.value: Literature data on the history of the development of a fundamentally new pea (Pisum) 'chameleon' morphotype as well as the issues regarding genetics and breeding of this morphotype are briefly discussed in the article. Own results of the comparative studies of such 'chameleon' samples as Az-96-718, Az-203-94, Az-92-2210 and Millenium variety in 2011 – 2012 are presented. By the vegetation period length and the number of unproductive knots, the 'chameleon' samples belong to mid ripening group. By stalk length, the 'chameleon' morphotype samples are included into the medium tall pea group. Az-96-718, Az-203-94, Az-92-2210 samples exceed Millenium variety in bean number per a plant and protein content in grain. Some shortcomings and ways of improvement of sample agronomic characters are described in the article.
